DOC.brief_summary: In patient acute myocardial infarction manage prehospital setting , treat primary angioplasty , evaluate benefit early administration tirofiban , powerful GPIIbIIIa inhibitor . Patients randomise early administration ambulance administration cathlab . The primary endpoint TIMI 2-3 flow first coronary opacification culprit artery .
DOC.brief_title: GPIIbIIIa Inhibitors RESCUe RESURCOR Networks Acute Myocardial Infarction
